description:
Most Platform-as-a-Service (PaaS) offerings have portability and integration problems. This results in being completely locked-in to a particular platform. Combining the open source model with PaaS however can guarantee greater flexibility.

In this session, we will dig deep into open source PaaS offerings and discuss how they allow you to avoid platform lock-in. We will also introduce the first 100% open source cloud platform for enterprise applications – WSO2 Stratos, and the concept of being “Cloud Native”.

   • Sponsored by WSO2
title: Open Source PaaS
